label: 紫檀
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 55th  . Nara National Museum . 2003
説明文: Dalbergia latifolia. A close-grained heavy wood of a dark purplishred color native to South India and Sri Lanka. Also Pterocarpus santalinus L. (J., kōki shitan), a tall tree with a rose-colored core from South India whose fine-grained, hardwood was prized for elegant furniture.  [紅木紫檀]
